snippet: Thirteen United States rowers came down with stomach illnesses at the World Junior Rowing Championships, and the team doctor said she suspected it was a result of pollution.
abstract: Thirteen members of United States team are sickened at World Junior Rowing Championships in Rio de Janeiro; team doctor suspects pollution in lake where race took place is to blame, though food and drinking water have not been ruled out as source of stomach illness.
lead_paragraph: Thirteen United States rowers came down with stomach illnesses at the World Junior Rowing Championships, and the team doctor said she suspected it was a result of pollution.

headline.main: Americans Become Ill at Rowing Event in Rio
headline.print_headline: Americans Become Ill at Rio Event
